Container.Name: TeslaCamPlayer
Container.Overview: TeslaCam Player is a self-hosted web viewer for your Tesla Sentry and Dashcam clips. It supports multi-camera playback (Front, Back, Repeaters, Pillars), timestamp syncing, and event marking.
Container.Description: TeslaCam Player allows you to browse and play video clips saved by your Tesla vehicle. Mount your TeslaCam folder to /TeslaCam inside the container. The database file (teslacam.db) will be stored in the root of the /TeslaCam directory to persist scan history.

Config.Name: Clips Directory
Config.Description: Path to your TeslaCam clips folder (containing RecentClips, SavedClips, SentryClips)

Config.Name: Web Port
Config.Description: The port to access the web interface

Config.Name: Disable HTTPS Redirection
Config.Description: Set to true to disable HTTPS redirection (recommended for local use)
